name: Santos Eric Luis
description: The reason I am on this site is to find my true love. I am very serious about this because I no longer want to be alone. Despite having hundreds of wonderful caring friends there still is a void in my life. I am not on this site to find someone to have sex with. Sex is great but it does not give you that ultimate joy and happiness that comes when you make love to someone you love. Just sex is only a temporary fix. I need and want love more than any thing else in my life and that only comes with developing a healthy relationship with a woman.
